name: find_zip_codes_by_city_and_street
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool polish_zip_codes.
Tool description: Poczta polska - zip codes
API description: Fetch zip codes for a given city and street using the Polish Zip Codes API.

city.description: Name of the city to search for zip codes.

street.description: Name of the street to search for zip codes.

x_traceid.description: A traceId that is copied to the API response header. Default is 'optional_abc123'.
